body:
Comment 2: 
I think it's fine to move the comment up a little.
But attaching it to the previous } line makes it no
longer have the right meaning.

More generally, I don't think you have to have both
position kinds in the tree.  The //line file.go:1 means
that the *next* line in the input is from file.go:1.
The comment itself can have as its position wherever
it actually appeared (x.go:7 or whatever).
